pages.title: Gain Niceness
pages.text: This chapter describes some ways to get $(l:patchouli_jam:naughty_or_nice/niceness)Niceness$() so you get an idea what you can do for it. This is not a complete list.

pages.title: Kill Bosses
pages.text: Killing the Ender-Dragon or a Wither will get you some niceness.

pages.title: Kill Pillagers
pages.text: Killing pillagers will give you some niceness.

pages.title: Spawn Golems
pages.text: Spawning golems gets you some niceness. Snowmen as well but only a little bit.

pages.title: Healing & Breeding
pages.text: Healing and breeding entities lets you climb on santa's list.

pages.title: Trading
pages.text: Trading with villagers and piglins can be profitable for both of you and your niceness.

pages.title: Farming
pages.text: Farming is a good action to do that will get you food and niceness.

pages.title: Winning Raids
pages.text: Winning a raid will not only make you popular among villagers but also for santa.

pages.title: Curing Zombies
pages.text: Cure a zombie villager to gain some niceness.
